description: Using AI as a personal trainer to plan out the best physical fitness routine
Scenario: 想要運動減肥的年輕女生
pain_points_and_needs: 1. User does not have health-related data to analyze the needs of their physical well-being thoroughly
2. There is a lack of comprehensive data collection and application scheme for health data analytics
3. Users may hurt themselves easily with the lack of sufficient knowledge when exercising
4. The need of “personalized” virtual trainers to increase the benefit of workouts
smart_solution: With this personalized AI model for health prediction and management system, users can wear smart clothes with built-in sensors to collect physiological signals such as heart rate, body fat, blood pressure, sleep quality on a daily basis for the medical staff to refer to. With the data in hand, this system utilizes AI intelligent data analysis to build a personalized health model and provide the most suitable exercising suggestions such as Tai Chi, tennis, golf to improve the health of users.
benefits: 1. Heart rate prediction accuracy up to 92%
2. Sleep quality/stress/exhaustion level prediction accuracy up to 70%
3. Includes 12 important indicators of human health, such as the overall cholesterol level and fasting blood sugar (FBS)
4. Adopted by at least eight health and fitness facilities in Taiwan
solution_description: The system collects user’s health data via smart clothing incorporated with sensors to detect daily physiological measurement, utilizes an AI model to analyze the health condition and recommend suitable exercises to promote user’s overall health.
reference_site: Gyms including Lightfitness in Taipei (Civic Blvd. Branch), CruxHealthtecH in Kaohsiung
